attributes.action: Give the British public the right to speak. Summer 2025 new Government vote.
attributes.additional_details:
To protect the future of our country, children, history and culture. We are scared due to the lies and we need the opportunity to let the world know what the British public really want and not want the government is telling us we want. 
GIVE US CHOICE, GIVE US FREEDOM OF SPEECH.
attributes.background:
Give the British public our freedom of speech. Stop Labour making up their own rules and taking our rights away. 
No more excuses about time frame, let us decide if we want a different government by allowing another election in the Summer 2025

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
